<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rubble](/Rules.aspx?ID=633)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 516 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Caverns can be covered in rubble, which is difficult terrain. Deep or pervasive rubble is also uneven ground.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Rubble
